component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
position true java.lang.String Position of the unit, can be "north","south","center","west","east".
size false java.lang.String Size of the unit. Accepted values are 'auto' or an integer value in pixels.
minSize false java.lang.Integer 50 Minimum size of the unit when resizing, 0 is as small as unit can go.
maxSize false java.lang.Integer 0 Maximum size of the unit when resizing, 0 is as small as unit can go.
spacingOpen false java.lang.Integer 6 Spacing between adjacent unit when unit is open.
spacingClosed false java.lang.Integer 6 Spacing between adjacent unit when unit is closed.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean true Makes the unit resizable.
closable false java.lang.Boolean true Makes the unit closable.
slidable false java.lang.Boolean true Makes the unit slidable.
style false java.lang.String Style to apply to container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style to apply to container element.
closed false java.lang.Boolean false When true, unit is displayed as closed by default.
effect false java.lang.String Name of the effect to be used for toggle animation.
effectSpeed false java.lang.String Speed of the toggle effect.
